text: Froyla Tzalam is a Belizean Mopan Maya anthropologist and community leader. It was announced on 22 April 2021 by Prime Minister of Belize John Briceno that she was nominated to be the next Governor-General of Belize. She is the third Governor-General and the second woman appointed to the role. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Governors-general of Belize Category:Articles needing translation from foreign-language Wikipedias Category:Current national leaders Category:Knights Grand Cross of the Order of St Michael and St George Category:Mexican anthropologists Category:Prime ministers of Belize Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Froyla Tzalam
